name: PatronService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Patron Service

scripts.deploy-dev: node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-qa: node-lambda deploy -e qa -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access' -b subnet-f35de0a9,subnet-21a3b244 -g sg-aa74f1db -P nypl-digital-dev
scripts.deploy-production: node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json -o 'arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access' -P nypl-digital-dev
